name: Maple Pecan Crunch Clusters
description: Indulge your senses with our Maple Pecan Crunch Clusters, a premium snack crafted for those who appreciate the finer things. Each cluster is a harmonious blend of roasted pecans and crispy oats, bound together with rich, organic maple syrup and a hint of sea salt. Perfect for elevating your breakfast, topping desserts, or enjoying straight from the bag. Handcrafted in small batches to ensure peak freshness and flavor, these clusters deliver a satisfying crunch with every bite. Treat yourself or gift a bag to a fellow foodie.

attributes.ingredients: Pecans, rolled oats, organic maple syrup, sea salt
